segments.text: What an attractive blouse , You look so pretty in this blue dress !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Thank you . I bought it in Spring Street yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's very nice.It goes well with your skirt .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you.It ' s very nice of you to say so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all.This dress certainly shows your good taste .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's quite a compliment coming from you .
segments.speaker: S2
